Boil water advisory canceled for Bucks County town

WPVI
September 16, 2012 7:23:57 AM PDT
Action News
LOWER SOUTHAMPTON, Pa. - September 14, 2012 --
Authorities have canceled a boil water advisory for residents in one Bucks County community.

Residents in the Siles neighborhood of Lower Southampton, from Wood Road to Brook Avenue on the north side of East Bristol Road, were advised to boil all water.

The Bucks County Water and Sewer Authority said a water main was damaged by a water company crew, compromising the water supply in the affected area.

Again, the advisory is canceled.

Customers with questions should call the authority at 215-343-3946.
